meanings.definition: A saddle for women on which they ride with both legs on one side.
meanings.sent1: She gracefully rode the horse using a sidesaddle.
meanings.sent2: The sidesaddle was designed specifically for women riders.
meanings.sent3: The sidesaddle made her feel like a princess on her horse.
meanings.sent4: Her elegance on the horse with the sidesaddle was unmatched.
meanings.sent5: The sidesaddle allowed her to ride comfortably with one leg on each side.

meanings.definition: Sit on a horse with both legs on one side.
meanings.sent1: She prefers to sidesaddle when riding her horse.
meanings.sent2: He sidesaddled the horse for a unique riding experience.
meanings.sent3: Sidesaddling the horse made him feel like a cowboy from the old movies.
meanings.sent4: She sidesaddled through the fields, feeling the wind in her hair.
meanings.sent5: The rider expertly sidesaddled along the trail, impressing onlookers.
